Isha Hong Kong News
September, 2016

We teach Hatha Yoga as a transformative process. The transformation will not only be on the level of your body but in the way you are

- Sadhguru
Hatha Yoga Programs
 

We will be offering various Hatha Yoga Programs in Hong Kong over the coming months.

Surya Kriya: 5-6 November

Surya Kriya is a potent yogic practice of tremendous antiquity, designed as a holistic process for health, wellness and complete inner wellbeing.

Register
 
Angamardana: 4-6 November 2016

Angamardana is a system rooted in yoga, that offers to everyone the opportunity to invigorate the body and to reach peak physical and mental health.

Register
 
Yogasanas & Bhuta Shuddhi: 26-27 November 2016 (Tentative)

Dates: 26-27 November 2016 (Tentative)
Yogasanas are a way of aligning the inner system and adjusting it to the celestial geometry, becoming in sync with the existence, and thus naturally achieving a chemistry of healthfulness, joyfulness and blissfulness, and above all balance.
